dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2707374T] On www.professorishiguro.com
dmca.body: To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2007 5:38 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2707374T] On www.professorishiguro.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. On www.professorishiguro.com Added by system at Wednesday, Jan 24 2007 09:33 pm X-MailFrom: ishiguro@ams.eng.osaka-u.ac.jp X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Jan 24 21:33:04 2007 Received: (qmail 14692 invoked by alias); 25 Jan 2007 03:33:04 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 14689 invoked from network); 25 Jan 2007 03:33:04 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by abacusdb.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 25 Jan 2007 03:33:04 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 24 Jan 2007 21:33:03 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 24 Jan 2007 21:33:04 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from ishiguro@ams.eng.osaka-u.ac.jp) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1H9vMF-0001ON-Qn for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 24 Jan 2007 21:33:03 -0600 Received: from mogw09.zaq.ne.jp ([211.124.127.9] helo=ougw03.zaq.ne.jp) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ishiguro@ams.eng.osaka-u.ac.jp) with esmtp (Exim) id 1H9vM9-00049K-NX for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 24 Jan 2007 21:32:58 -0600 Received: from ouma01.zaq.ne.jp (ouma01.zaq-back.ne.jp [10.2.80.33]) by ougw03.zaq.ne.jp with ESMTP id D18331CC003; Thu, 25 Jan 2007 12:32:51 +0900 (JST) Received: from IshiguroSZ90PS (i004240.xgsn1.imtp.yoyogie.mopera.ne.jp [219.114.168.240]) by ouma01.zaq.ne.jp with ESMTP id E30B7334248; Thu, 25 Jan 2007 12:32:46 +0900 (JST) Reply-To: From: "Hiroshi Ishiguro" To: Cc: Subject: On www.professorishiguro.com Date: Thu, 25 Jan 2007 12:32:41 +0900 Organization: Osaka University Message-ID: <000101c74031$7d5b5060$f0a872db@IshiguroSZ90PS> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: AcdAHC2wNwOfMyZCRM6GD4SKILNF8g== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Jan 2007 03:33:03.0984 (UTC) FILETIME=[85732700:01C74031] MIME element (text/plain) Dear ThePlanet.com, I am a professor of Osaka University in Japan. I have found a serious problem in your web server. You have the following page: www.professorishiguro.com However, this is not my page. Someone made the page without my permission. The content is terrible. It is using many materials from my my web page http://www.ed.ams.eng.osaka-u.ac.jp/ But they are modified and it lies on me. This is defamation of character. This is copyright piracy. In addition to these, there are possibilities that the page use for deception and phishing. Please remove the page as soon as possible. Hiroshi Ishiguro Professor of Osaka University, Japan http://www.ed.ams.eng.osaka-u.ac.jp/ E-mail:ishiguro@ams.eng.osaka-u.ac.jp >>> Active Whois 3.0.4403 >>> Thu, 18 January 2007 19:01:44 -0800 (Pacific Standard Time) >>> Looking for 'www.professorishiguro.com' >>> >>> www.professorishiguro.com [70.86.92.18] - host alive, connection >>> speed 211ms >>> >>> --- >>> Domain owner: >>> Looking for 'professorishiguro.com' >>> Domain zone 'COM' is for commercial purposes >>> URL for registration of domains: >>> http://www.internic.net/origin.html >>> >>> Server 'whois.enom.com' reply [2110 bytes in raw data]: >>> >>> =-=-=-= >>> Visit AboutUs.org for more information about professorishiguro.com >>> >> >AboutUs: >>> professorishiguro.com >>> >>> Registration Service Provided By: Sameerz.com >>> Contact: samirshujja@yahoo.com >>> >>> Domain name: professorishiguro.com >>> >>> Administrative Contact: >>> Sameerz.com >>> Sameer Ali Muhammad arif (samirshujja@yahoo.com) >>> +92.00923008265554 >>> Fax: +92.00923008265554 >>> G-70 Jilani Center, Near MW Tower >>> Karachi, SINDH 74000 >>> PK >>> >>> Technical Contact: >>> Sameerz.com >>> Sameer Ali Muhammad arif (samirshujja@yahoo.com) >>> +92.00923008265554 >>> Fax: +92.00923008265554 >>> G-70 Jilani Center, Near MW Tower >>> Karachi, SINDH 74000 >>> PK >>> >>> Registrant Contact: >>> Sameerz.com >>> Sameer Ali Muhammad arif (samirshujja@yahoo.com) >>> +92.00923008265554 >>> Fax: +92.00923008265554 >>> G-70 Jilani Center, Near MW Tower >>> Karachi, SINDH 74000 >>> PK >>> >>> Status: Locked >>> >>> We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
